questions.quote: That irreverence, that wit I'd recognize it anywhere. Some charlatan has stolen a Ziggy and passed it off as his own. I can prove it. Quick Elaine, to my archives.
Well, how long you've been seeing her. What's your phone call frequency? Are you on a daily?
Whatever!!. . . . Oh oh oh this is unbelievable. This is better than my bed at home.
Oh, you're welcome. You know I think I ate too much of that garlic.
Oh! That's good judgment. That's a pile of judgment there. Sure.
Yes yes George. Can you talk to me for a second? Of course you can -- I'm a very accessible man. I just wanted to say you're doing great work on that Canola oil stuff.
Elaine, I don't want you causing any trouble down at that soup stand. I happen to love that soup.
Yeah.. When he's dead he'll be relieved... Oh by the way Viking Press sent a Fedex for you to my parents. They brought it with 'em.
Play Now thinks I got problems in both legs. My own personal Rascal, Jerry. On the house.
Do you know that I have been using the same bottle of shampoo for a year? And I shampoo every day.  So, what do you think of my conversation?
